title: 12  Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Belts and Gears, 1927/32
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">12  
Designed by Sergi Petrovich Burylin (Russian, 1876–1942)  
Manufactured by Ivanovo-Voznesensk Factories (Russia)  
Belts and Gears  
1927/32  
Cotton, twill weave; probably screen-printed; 10 × 18.4 cm (4 × 7 1/4 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.28

</section><section id="figures">Sergi Petrovich Burylin, Belts and Gears, 1927/32.
